adjectives.description: supercool (comparative more supercool, superlative most supercool)

entries.meaning: (informal) Very cool; thoroughly excellent, relaxed, or fashionable.
examples: On to how to access your Home folder from a remote Mac — a supercool feature that's only bound to get more popular as the Internet continues to mature.

verbs.description: supercool (third-person singular simple present supercools, present participle supercooling, simple past and past participle supercooled)

entries.meaning: (physics) To cool a material below its transition temperature without that transition occurring
